name: The Mystery Of Bane Tavern - Full Version
name_original: The Mystery Of Bane Tavern - Full Version
description:
The Mystery of Bane Tavern.

This is the full version that has the full original story and ending text intact. The Jam version has had some of the text removed to stay on a single page. Plus instead of having the two on the same page, it would be a lot more accessible to make separate pages for both.

2 players are recommended, the Quest begins with players lured into a tavern, they are poisoned and taken under the establishment, they must fight various warriors and minions, find keys around the dungeon to escape. 

You have been completely stripped of your gear. You only have a short sword and a potion of healing to start with. You must defeat the warriors within the arena and grab the gear they have dropped, make your way to the exit.
